text: Happy Friday! This user is wondering about splitting html in list/array for their blog template. Any thoughts or suggestions to get them started would be greatly appreciated: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Content-Design-Questions/Split-html-document-in-array-list/m-p/216582>
i am curious what the answer to this is myself purely from an academic perspective

If you are interested in sharing your feedback regarding the developer experience within HubSpot, we have a new survey out and we would :heart: your input: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Content-Design-Questions/HubSpot-Developer-Survey/m-p/216435/highlight/false#M9678>

this user is looking for any help/tips regarding a no_wrapper option for macros; if anyone has any tips or docs to assist, it would be greatly appreciated! <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Content-Design-Questions/Remove-wrapper-from-macro/m-p/216775>

Hi again! Lots of conversation starters for this Friday! :slightly_smiling_face:

This user is new to HubSpot and is looking to add a font awesome icon picker to a module. If anyone has any suggestions, tips, tricks or wizardry to share, it would be so appreciated! <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Content-Design-Questions/FontAwesome-icon-picker-in-edit-mode/m-p/216931>
